name: SECRET GARDEN RESTAURANT
address: The Court Yard, Mersham Le Hatch, Hythe Road, Ashford, Kent, TN25 6NH
description: We are an award winning Restaurant and Events Venue.  We are well known throughout Kent for our Fabulous Afternoon Teas, home made cakes, savoury items and confectionery. We are offering click & collect on Afternoon Teas, Cream Teas, Sausage rolls, brownies, Fudge and other delights for Collection Only.  Order via Website / Facebook / phone.
